alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 11:57AM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jackson, northern Madison, southeastern Lincoln and southwestern Franklin Counties through 1230 PM CST... At 1157 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Harvest, or near Meridianville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northern Huntsville, Moores Mill, Meridianville, Hazel Green, Huntland, Harvest, New Market, Lincoln, Princeton and Elkwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CST for north central Alabama...and Middle Tennessee.
